description.en: Site where players of the game osu! can track their progress and view the progression of others. Pulls data from the osu! API, storing time series data and creating a variety of charts, plots, statistics, and other visualizations for a variety of different metrics. An in-game chat bot and Discord bot were also written to allow users to update their stats from in-game. Thousands of players a month continue to use osu!track.
